metadata.name: Nauman's First Zinger Burger
metadata.description:
Having a true and sincere friend is actually a blessing and apparently, the internet is filled with such great examples. Normally, we have seen friends celebrating each other’s life achievements and success but recently, the friendship bar was taken to another level.

On 29 January 2020, a group of Pakistani boys congratulated their friends along with a poster on having his life’s first ‘Zinger Burger’  which is downright hilarious!

Their post gathered upwards of 3,400 reactions, 796 shares and 2,800 comments on Meta (Facebook). Simply put, this was just the beginning of the ‘Friendship’ saga. Inadvertently Nauman generated one of the biggest friendship circles we have ever seen.

By owning the blockchain stamped and official, ‘Nauman's First Zinger Burger’ NFT, you can guarantee long lasting display of friendship bond between the group and fan community.

960 x 640 pixels
